Class URIBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kitesdk.data.URIBuilder

extends Object
    Builds dataset and view URIs

    0.17.0

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public static URI build(String repoUri,
        String namespace,
        String dataset)
        Builds a dataset URI from the given repository URI string, namespace, and dataset name.
        Parameters:
        repoUri - a repository URI string
        namespace - a String namespace
        dataset - a String dataset name
        Returns:
        a dataset URI for the namespace and dataset name in the repository
        Since:
        0.17.0

        public URIBuilder with(String name,
              Object value)
        Adds a view constraint equivalent to RefinableView.with(String, Object...)
        Parameters:
        name - the field name of the Entity
        value - the field value
        Returns:
        this builder for method chaining

      • build

        public URI build()
        Returns a dataset or view URI encompassing the given constraints. The referenced Dataset or View may be loaded again with Datasets.load(URI, Class).
        Returns:
        a dataset or view URI
        Since:
        0.17.0
